forbidden.name: geometry-layer-violation
forbidden.comment: Geometry layer must be pure math (only depend on Core).

forbidden.name: mechanics-layer-violation
forbidden.comment: Mechanics layer must be pure and not depend on higher layers.

forbidden.name: generation-layer-violation
forbidden.comment: Generation layer cannot depend on Rules, Analysis, Moves, or Bots.

forbidden.name: rules-layer-violation
forbidden.comment: Rules layer (Validator/Enumerator) cannot depend on Analysis, Moves, or Bots.

forbidden.name: evaluation-layer-violation
forbidden.comment: Evaluation layer (Coach) evaluates state, not moves or bots.

forbidden.name: moves-layer-violation
forbidden.comment: Moves are executed by game engine, should not depend on Bots.

forbidden.name: bypass-rule-facade
forbidden.comment: Moves must access rules via the RuleEngine facade (validator.ts) or Query facade (queries.ts).

forbidden.name: logic-ui-violation
forbidden.comment: Game logic (Core, Rules, Moves) cannot depend on UI (Features, Shared).

forbidden.name: shared-layer-violation
forbidden.comment: Shared UI cannot depend on Features or Game Logic (except Core Types/Config).

forbidden.name: feature-isolation
forbidden.comment: Features should be independent. Cross-feature imports are discouraged.
